name: Root Rancher
description:
Veggies are running amok yet the farmers market is not getting any slower. Capture and deliver all the orders to your customers but be careful, time is ticking!

Game created for Global Game Jam 2023.

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • Right click - Aiming the lasso
  • Left click - Throw the lasso
  • Must Alt-F4 after reaching game over

Credits:
